title: Welcome Message
content: Welcome to our smart classroom system!

title: Morning Announcement
content: Good morning students! Have a great day of learning.

title: Emergency Alert
content: This is an emergency broadcast. Please evacuate immediately.

title: Lunch Break
content: It's time for lunch! Please proceed to the cafeteria.

title: End of Day
content: School day is ending. Please gather your belongings and head home safely.
